lyrics:
19 contributorslost in you lyricsverse 1
i always knew that youd come back to get me
and you always knew that it wouldnt be easy
to go back to the start to see where it all began
or end up at the bottom to watch how it all ends

prechorus
you tried to lie and say i was everything
i remember when i said im nothing without you
im nothing without you

chorus
somehow i found a way to get lost in you
let me inside let me get close to you
change your mind ill get lost if you want me to
somehow i found a way to get lost in you

verse 2
you always thought that i left myself open
but you didnt know i was already broken
i told myself that it wouldnt be so bad
but pulling away you took everything i had

prechorus
you tried to lie and say i was everything
i remember when i said im nothing without you
im nothing without you
you might also likechorus
somehow i found a way to get lost in you
let me inside let me get close to you
change your mind ill get lost if you want me to
somehow i found a way to get lost in you in you

bridge
the pain of it all the rise and the fall
i see it all in you
now every day i find myself saying
i want to get lost in you
im nothing without you

chorus
somehow i found a way to get lost in you
let me inside let me get close to you
change your mind ill get lost if you want me to
somehow i found a way to get lost in you somehow i found

outro
a way to get lost in you
a way to get lost in you12embed
